title: patita pAvana
sahitya:
patita pAvana.  rAgA: tODi.  tALA: Adi
 


1:  patita pAvana rAma pashupatinuta nAma
paripUrNa satya kAma param jyOtihi parandAma
2.  pankajOpama caraNa bhaktAbISTa vitaraNa
sankaTa rAshiharaNa samsaArArNavOddharaNa
 caraNam 3    sAmajAbaya dAyaka sarva bhuvana nAyaka
rAma sAkEta nAyaka rAmadAsa hrnnAyaka
